name: Project HS
description:
PROJECT HS:

Play as an incoming freshman at Colston’s School of Greats, a high school renowned for its prestige and competition. Witness his attempt to overcome the scholastic legacy left behind by the mysterious girl in the red dress. Watch as he clashes both with rivals in showdowns of academic prowess and the ideals of his opponents and even his own.

Battle your rivals in a rhythm game system with Guitar Hero-like mechanics! Time the rhythm bar with the music to align it with the scrolling notes! Use moves with type advantage to do more damage! Explore the scenes with 2D platformer movement!

CONTROLS: 

Arrow keys - Platforming buttons

Z - Select or Academics move

X - Arts move

C - Athletics move

NOTE: Project HS is still in development. What is currently released is a demo which previews a few of the game's main mechanics and a bit of the story.
